sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 8 cm and a height of 5 cm. What is the area of the parallelogram?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be found using the formula: Area = base × height.

In this case, the base is 8 cm and the height is 5 cm.

Area = 8 cm × 5 cm = 40 square centimeters.

The area of the parallelogram is 40 square centimeters.
